name: kyoo
description: Kyoo is a self hosted video server built with a focus on anime and TV series. It scans libraries, pulls metadata and lets users browse and stream content from a responsive web front end tailored to large episodic collections.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Stream anime, TV series, and movies from self-hosted library. Your personal streaming server

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Automatic media library scanning with metadata fetching. Organize content effortlessly

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Modern, responsive video player with subtitle support. Watch on any device

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Native Android app for mobile viewing. Stream on the go

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Individual user accounts with separate watch history. Share library with family
